methods.javadoc:
A callback for when a Task is starting to be tracked.
@param task The task being tracked.
methods.name: taskAdded
methods.comment: A callback for when a Task is starting to be tracked.

methods.javadoc:
A callback when a task is no longer being tracked.
@param task The task that is no longer tracked.
methods.name: taskRemoved
methods.comment: A callback when a task is no longer being tracked.

params.name: task
params.comment: The task that is no longer tracked.
